name: places/ChIJH8Pll4pZwokR8v9iZ3fgZ-Q
formattedAddress: 310 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 310 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chic rooms & suites in a refined hotel with a sophisticated restaurant & a stylish bar.

originalText.text: If I could give this site 100 stars I would. I visited in December, around New Year's, and I can say that the treatment was always cordial, they always tried to help me and make me feel good. Here I had one of the best breakfasts of my life at a spacious table where my girlfriend was working online while we enjoyed breakfast. They have a dog park and it is a super dog friendly place. They offered me a bed for our dog. This place really made my trip to NY unforgettable.

originalText.text: We loved our stay at the Soho Grand!  Our room was beautiful and extremely comfortable.  The bed and pillows were a dream.  Everyone was helpful and friendly during check-in and check-out.  The hotel is in a great location - near several restaurants and bars on our itinerary.  We also ate at the Soho Diner and it was delicious!  We will definitely return soon.

text.text: We loved our stay at the Soho Grand!  Our room was beautiful and extremely comfortable.  The bed and pillows were a dream.  Everyone was helpful and friendly during check-in and check-out.  The hotel is in a great location - near several restaurants and bars on our itinerary.  We also ate at the Soho Diner and it was delicious!  We will definitely return soon.

originalText.text: The place is unmatched. It’s as cool as it is fancy, and it is as friendly as it is chic. Such a dream come true. Every inch of the place is photo worthy for a Super cool pic.  People are so incredibly friendly, and the food and drink are amazing. Be sure to eat at the Soho diner anytime of day.  We simply posted a picture… Taken by the incredibly friendly Doorman… and our friends and family have been raving about the Soho grand!  It is simply the coolest place and completely worth staying there.  She says that it is mission-driven, and so customer focused. Such an experience.

originalText.text: My favorite place to stay in NYC! The staff is amazing, the location is convenient and walkable to anything and everything you may need and the rooms are unique, clean, and very comfortable. The staff went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Can't wait to go back!

text.text: My favorite place to stay in NYC! The staff is amazing, the location is convenient and walkable to anything and everything you may need and the rooms are unique, clean, and very comfortable. The staff went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Can't wait to go back!

originalText.text: This is an easy review as the room was wonderful and the service, Marcus Morales, was the best ever!  We were there on a busy weekend in NYC and Marcus made us feel like visiting royalty. We are def going back! Ubers were easy to catch, the hotel had a cool vibe, the room was big and comfortable and the service - again, the best I have had in NY.
